title: Clusiolum
description: Clusiolum is an unlocated site in Umbria. Pliny the Elder discusses it in connection with the Felginates who at one point held Clusiolum. Its location is described as being above Interamna.

properties.description: The terrace platform that supports the church of Sant'Erasmo di Cesi has been put forward as a possible location for the Umbrian center of Clusiolum
properties.title: location of Sant'Erasmo di Cesi

properties.description: The terrace platform that supports the church of Sant'Erasmo di Cesi has been put forward as a possible location for the Umbrian center of Clusiolum. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: location of terrace of Sant'Erasmo di Cesi
